shapes3d

Interface I_Shape


  • public interface I_Shape
    You can create a class to represent your own shape. To work with the library the class must implement this interface. It defines all the necessary draw methods to be implemented by your class. Objects created from your class are are used in conjunction with the XShape class to work seamlessly with this library.
    The class you create will be responsible for managing vertices, texture co-ordinates etc.
    Author:
    Peter Lager

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drawForPicker(PGraphicsOpenGL pickBuffer)
      Draw the shape for the 3D picker.

      Draw with the colour already set.
      void drawWithTexture(PApplet app, PImage skin)
      Draw the shape with the given texture.

    • Method Detail

      • drawForPicker

        void drawForPicker(PGraphicsOpenGL pickBuffer)
        Draw the shape for the 3D picker. There is no need to set the pick color since it is done in XShape before we get here.
        Parameters:
        pickBuffer -

      • drawWithTexture

        void drawWithTexture(PApplet app,
                   PImage skin)
        Draw the shape with the given texture. The textureMode has been set to NORMAL if you are using pixel coordinates then set to IMAGE.
        Parameters:
        app -
        skin -

      • drawWithoutTexture

        void drawWithoutTexture(PApplet app)
        Draw with the colour already set.
        Parameters:
        app -
